EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Save!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <!-- ${CTAText} <!-- <[[${CTALink}]]> UP TO 50% OFF Bic Pens BIC Gel-ocity Retractable Gel Pens, Black Retractable design BIC Gel-ocity Quick-Dry Retractable Gel Pens, Assorted Tungsten carbide ball tip Shop Now BIC Gel-ocity Retractable Gel Pen, Fashion Colours Barrel and grip colour matches ink Shop Now <!-- ${CTAText} <!-- <[[${CTALink}]]> UP TO 30% OFF Keyboard Accessories Fellowes Office Suites Deluxe Keyboard Drawer With Soft-Touch Wrist Rest Made with 100% recycled materials Shop Now Fellowes Designer Suites Compact Keyboard and Mouse Tray Memory foam wrist supports for mouse pad and keyboard area Shop Now Global Keyboard Tray with Sliding Mouse Support GREENGUARD Certified Shop Now <!-- ${CTAText} <!-- <[[${CTALink}]]> UP TO 50% OFF Post-it Extreme Notes <!-- ${CTAText} <!-- <[[${CTALink}]]> Free Shipping In Stock Clearance Big Deals Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111 *While quantities last. Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special-order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms or call 1-866-391-8111 for details. © 2019 Grand & Toy Limited
